name: Grand River Hospital to Waterloo Regional Health Network (WHRN) - WRHN at Midtown
comment:
Supports for people living with type 1 diabetes or gestational diabetes * one-on-one or group education on monitoring blood sugar levels, medications, healthy eating, exercise, and other lifestyle choices * registered nurse and dietitian on staff

Programs include:
  • insulin pump therapy
  • education programs
  • insulin initiation

Grand River Hospital to Waterloo Regional Health Network (WHRN) - WRHN at Midtown

Supports for people living with type 1 diabetes or gestational diabetes * one-on-one or group education on monitoring blood sugar levels, medications, healthy eating, exercise, and other lifestyle choices * registered nurse and dietitian on staff<br><br>Programs include:<br><ul><li>insulin pump therapy</li><li>education programs</li><li>insulin initiation</li></ul>

description_of_this:
Supports for people living with type 1 diabetes or gestational diabetes * one-on-one or group education on monitoring blood sugar levels, medications, healthy eating, exercise, and other lifestyle choices * registered nurse and dietitian on staff

Programs include:
  • insulin pump therapy
  • education programs
  • insulin initiation
